title: Mystery GIfting
body: I'm wanting to GIft a friend I have on League, however his summoner name does not pop up in the "chosing who the gift is for" part. I tried relogging and such however it still doesn't work. Any help?

replies.body: *Lew* is once again, spot-on with their assessment of the situation. You have to be friends with someone for over a day before they'll show up in the gifting center for gifting. If it's been over a day and you still aren't seeing their summoner name listed in the gifting center, please let me know.
Have you guys been friends for over a day?  You can't [gift ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ)players if you just recently added them.
